text: Samuel Luiz Muñiz was a nursing assistant, who was beaten to death in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain, on 3 July 2021 as a victim of homophobic violence. Samuel Luiz was talking to his friend, Vanessa Gonzalez, when he was attacked at about 2:45 am. After his death, people started doing demonstrations to protest violence against LGBT people. == References == Category:Deaths by beating Category:Province of A Coruña Category:Spanish LGBT people Category:Victims of anti-LGBT hate crimes Category:Crime in Spain
title: Killing of Samuel Luiz
